posts.post_content:
The following cards are available for sale.  Price includes shipping and paypal fees.  Scans will be available upon request.  Please contact me if you have questions.  Thanks! 
Jim

t201 Summers/ Jennings SGC 80/6  $150
t202 Chase Dives into Third Gibson/Clarke SGC 40/3 $100
t202 Collins Easily Safe Byrne/Clarke PSA 5 SOLD
t205 George Graham (Rustlers) Polar Bear SGC 40/3 $25
t205 Lefty Leifield (A. on Front) Sweet Caporal SGC 50/4 SOLD
t205 Charles O'Leary SGC 30/2 $18
t205 Fred Payne SGC 50/4 $35
t206 Clark Griffith (Portrait) Sweet Caporal PSA 4 SOLD
t206 Steve Evans Piedmont BVG 5 SOLD
t206 Bob Groom Sweet Caporal BVG 3 SOLD
t206 Oscar Stanage Sweet Caporal BVG 5.5 SOLD
t206 Bill Sweeney Sweet Caporal BVG 4.5 SOLD
t206 Ira Thomas Sweet Caporal BVG 4.5 $40
t206 Vic Willis (Throwing) Piedmont BVG 4.5 SOLD
t207 Josh Devore Recruit SGC 50/4 SOLD
t207 J.G. Graney Recruit SCG 40/3 SOLD
t207 Otto Knabe Recruit SGC 40/3 SOLD
t212 Bernard Vernon 1909 Obak BVG 1 SOLD

Make an offer on the entire lot.
I'll take the T207 Graney.  PM sent.

Jim,

I'll also take the T212 Bernard.
Please put me down for this card, but would like to see scan first...Cheers, Pat
Can I get a scan of the T205 Payne?  Here is my email address, [url]b.brownbaseball@verizon.net[/url]  Thanks, Bill
Hey Jim- I'll take the Liefield SGC 50 card for $40.00. Thanks, Bill
Hello, could you post some scans of your remaining T207s?
Here are the front and back scans of the remaining t207s.
Would it be possible to see scans of the remaining t205's? Thank you :)
Hey Jim- I'll take the T207 Devore card for $30.00. E-mail me it's availability. Thanks, Bill

Tucker,
I will post scans of the remaining t205s when I get home later today.

Bill,
The Devore is yours.  Do you have my paypal address?

Thanks!
Jim
